containerOverrides.description: One or more container overrides that are sent to a task. See below.

cpu.description: The CPU override for the task.

executionRoleArn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the task execution role override for the task.

inferenceAcceleratorOverrides.description: Elastic Inference accelerator override for the task. See below.

memory.description: The memory override for the task.

taskRoleArn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role that containers in this task can assume.
